objectives: Students will discuss hobbies and free time using Expert/Academic register language
Students will engage with Sports/Competition themed scenarios related to hobbies and free time
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of expert level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining hobbies and free time content with Sports/Competition narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore hobbies and free time through a Sports/Competition lens using Expert/Academic language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a competitive sports scenario involving hobbies and free time

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice expert register vocabulary related to hobbies and free time in a sports context
Students engage in sports themed role-play about hobbies and free time using expert register
Students create original sports themed content about hobbies and free time in expert register

discussion_questions: How would you describe hobbies and free time in a Sports/Competition scenario?
What competition or victory might be involved in hobbies and free time?
Can you create a Sports/Competition story about hobbies and free time?
How does hobbies and free time change when viewed through a Sports/Competition perspective?
What expert register expressions would you use to discuss this sports scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Sports/Competition situation involving hobbies and free time
roles: Character A: Using expert register in sports context
Character B: Responding in expert register within sports theme

topic_genre_blend: hobbies and free time with competition
hobbies and free time with victory
hobbies and free time with training

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Expert/Academic throughout: Scholarly, technical, high-level discourse
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Sports/Competition theme: Athletic challenges, competition, teamwork

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Expert/Academic register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Sports/Competition themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of expert register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
